dinero-market-address.repayCardInfo: Select a DNR balance % to repay The contract will refund the difference
dinero-market-address.borrowFormLoanInfoTip1: The maximum amount of Dinero this market can lend.
dinero-market-address.borrowFormLoanInfoTip2:
Total amount of DNR owed (principal + interest
rate) including the planned transaction
dinero-market-address.borrowFormLoanInfoTip3:
If the collateral token drops to this price,
you are at risk of liquidation.
dinero-market-address.borrowFormLoanInfoTip4:
If this value reaches 0, you are at risk of
liquidation.
dinero-market-address.positionTip1: Amount of Tokens Deposited as Collateral
dinero-market-address.positionTip2:
USD Value of the Collateral Deposited to
the loan position
dinero-market-address.positionTip3:
DNR Currently Borrowed in your Position
+ interest rate
dinero-market-address.positionTip4:
Collateral Price at which your Loan
Position will be Liquidated
dinero-market-address.positionTip6:
Maximum amount of collateral you can
withdraw from this loan position
dinero-market-address.loanInfoLpFreeMarketTip1:
Maximum collateral ratio - MCR represents
the maximum amount of debt a user
can borrow with a particular
collateral token.
dinero-market-address.loanInfoLpFreeMarketTip2:
This is the discount a liquidator gets when
buying collateral for liquidation
dinero-market-address.loanInfoLpFreeMarketTip3:
This fee is added to the debt every time
the user borrows DNR
dinero-market-address.loanInfoLpFreeMarketTip5: Number of $INT tokens you have accrued
dinero-market-address.loanInfoLpFreeMarketTip6: Value of your rewards in USD
dinero-market-address.loanInfoERC20Tip1:
Maximum collateral ratio - MCR represents
the maximum amount of debt a user
can borrow with a particular
collateral token.
dinero-market-address.loanInfoERC20Tip2:
This is the discount a liquidator gets when
buying collateral for liquidation
dinero-market-address.loanInfoERC20Tip3:
This fee is added to the debt every time
the user borrows DNR
dinero-market-address.loanInfoNativeTip1:
Maximum collateral ratio - MCR represents
the maximum amount of debt a user
can borrow with a particular
collateral token.
dinero-market-address.loanInfoNativeTip2:
This is the discount a liquidator gets when
buying collateral for liquidation
dinero-market-address.loanInfoNativeTip3:
This fee is added to the debt every time
the user borrows DNR
dinero-market-address.userLTVTip:
If this value reaches 100%,
you might get liquidated
dinero-market-address.toastError: Borrow or collateral amount are wrong
